title: BET BOLD ON ELEMENTALS
section_1: ETF Token stands as the bridge between memetic value and one of the most pivotal catalysts the cryptocurrency realm has ever witnessed. Firmly grasping the GambleFi concept, ETF Token is committed to furnishing automatic rewards for every ETF holder, distributed in the form of ETF/ETH LP tokens. These coveted LP rewards then open doors to exclusive staking pools, where you can confidently stake your convictions on the forthcoming SEC verdicts concerning the spot Bitcoin ETF. It's an opportunity to bet boldly. So Bet ETF.

section_1_topics.title: AUTO LP REFLECTIONS:
section_1_topics.description:
Half of all transaction fees are automatically added to the $ETF/WETH liquidity pool and redistributed back to ALL holders as UniV2 tokens.

No staking required-all $ETF holders automatically earn these passive rewards which may be manually claimed via etherscan or in our dashboard, or automatically whenever holders buy, sell, or transfer any amount of tokens.

section_1_topics.title: LP STAKING & GAMIFICATION:
section_1_topics.description: $ETF holders can use their LP rewards tokens to participate in the gamification of the pending spot BTC ETF application by utilizing unique betting vaults.

roadmaps.title: FIRST DEADLINE BLUE MOON
points: Automatic LP rewards to $ETF holders begin
Dapp to view and claim LP rewards
